content:
Certainly, here are some family-friendly events in Fremantle that are perfect for children:

1. Fremantle Markets: A bustling marketplace that offers great food, live music, and local crafts, open every weekend

2. Fremantle Fishing Boat Harbour: A scenic harbor with great seafood restaurants and plenty of outdoor space for kids to enjoy.

3. Fremantle Prison Tour: A unique guided tour of a historic prison with interactive exhibits and displays, suitable for older kids.

4. Esplanade Youth Plaza: A skate park designed for young people with various level skate bowls and an awesome pump track.

5. Fremantle Street Arts Festival: An annual festival featuring street performers, musicians, and stalls from local vendors, held in April each year.

6. Fremantle Winter Music Festival: A two-day music event with live performances by local bands and artists, held annually in June.

7. Fremantle Children’s Literature Centre: A centre focused on promoting children's literature through exhibits, workshops, and storytelling sessions.

These are just a few examples of the many family-friendly events and places that Fremantle has to offer kids.
